title: Condo For Rent In Birmingham
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Welcome to 1965 Graefield, 2 bedroom 1 bath townhome in the sought after Graefield Community.
Brand new kitchen (2022), reglazed tub (2020) and new Hot Water Heater (2021).
Beautiful custom woodwork though-out including crown molding and hard wood flooring.
Nicely finished lower level and laundry in unit.
Home is equipped with smart lighting and thermostat.
Location convenient to shopping, LA Fitness and Whole Foods plus the new Whistle Stop Diner and Griffin Claw Brewery!
Located on a quiet street surrounded by walking paths and parks.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
The buyer is advised to independently verify the accuracy of all information through personal inspection and with appropriate professionals.
